description: Real, simple and easy to clean Drawer Mats provide a multi-purpose surface that can be used in cabinets, drawers, cupboards or even in the refrigerator. Also helps with bathroom shelves. It is 100% recyclable and non-toxic.    It can be easily cut in desired shape, while it is anti-bacterial, long lasting and shake resistant mat. Add practical style to shelves, drawers, and work surfaces with this anti-skid desk mat.
